easy and trendy pattern with video tutorial this pattern is included in the just two seams collection introducing the hummingbird crochet cardigan a delightful blend of elegance and simplicity this open-lace crochet cardigan is a stylish garment for all seasons whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting your journey this pattern is crafted with you in mind **features ** **easy and trendy ** this crochet cardigan pattern is designed to be both fashionable and accessible with basic stitches and clear instructions it s perfect for beginners looking to embark on a new project **worked flat ** the pattern is worked flat allowing you to easily visualize and create each section of the cardigan **seamed construction ** seam down the arms and sides for a polished finish that enhances the structure of the cardigan **ribbed detailing ** the front opening is adorned with ribbing adding texture and charm to the final piece **guided diagrams ** each section of the pattern comes with detailed diagrams guiding you through every step of the process **video tutorial ** need extra guidance we ve got you covered with a comprehensive video tutorial ensuring you can follow along with ease **size-inclusive from xs-5x** **materials needed ** yarn wecrochet heatherly sport 1 1300 1400 1500 1600 1700 1850 2000 2150 2300 yards crochet hook 2 4 0mm tapestry needle 3 stitch markers 4 scissors 5 **level beginner** **pattern includes ** written instructions stitch charts guided diagrams video tutorial garment schematic cheers -
